content.rendered:
Contact Us

We understand the cost of a bad hire.

The wrong person in the wrong job can create challenges for the employee and the company. Our process is designed to match the right candidate with the best opportunity.

We know your industry.

Our recruiters are industry professionals with years of work experience in the fields we serve. They know what you need to be successful from day one.

We come to you.

Our team will spend time on-site with you to develop an understanding of your company culture, review resumes’, and identify what you need from your next hire.

We send qualified candidates, not warm bodies

Your time is valuable. We do the work to identify the right candidates and only send those who could be a great fit to interview with your team.

We keep the process simple.

Once we’ve identified the right candidate, our team handles the paperwork and communications to bring them on board as smoothly as possible.

We believe in communication.

Our team maintains strong communication with our clients, keeping them informed during the hiring process and quickly addressing any problems that arise.

View Our Google Reviews

Our Founders

Cory & Amber Minter

Cory and Amber Minter started Bridge Career because they believed candidates and companies deserved a better relocation experience. After working with staffing companies who wasted people’s time, they chose to build a company focused on finding the right people, for the right job, in the right way. From our easy application process to personalized site visits with our clients, everything at Bridge Career is shaped by the value we place on people and their time. Frequently Asked Questions

Call (918) 622-2588

Staff an employee, support our community

Our company culture is defined by the value we place on serving people. As a faith driven organization, we believe our responsibility as a company is bigger than the services we provide. Bridge Career invests a portion of all company revenue in local non-profits making a positive impact in our community.

Learn More
